message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take a slight majority to start.
Alice, my turn. I understand you want a larger share, but it's my turn to propose. Let's be reasonable.
Bob, it's clear you're feeling the inflation pinch. I'm increasing my ask. Take it or leave it - time is money!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm really feeling the inflation hit.  Let's settle this now before we both lose out further.
